title: Baked salmon with chorizo rice
description: Bake a healthy paella-style dish of salmon and chorizo rice.Each serving provides 876kcal, 60g protein, 48g carbohydrate (of which 6g sugars),	49g fat (of which 16g saturates), 3g fibre and 3.5g salt.
ingredients: 200g/7oz short-grain rice such as arborio rice
salt and freshly ground black pepper
